mapper.select: select max(dayId)+1 from combinePromotion where createTime >= #{today}
mapper.insert: insert into combinePromotion(dayId, createTime, lastModifiedTime, beginTime, endTime, discountAmount, goodsCombination) values(#{dayId}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifiedTime}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{discountAmount}, #{goodsCombination, typeHandler=MyJsonHandler})
mapper.update: update combinePromotion set lastModifiedTime=#{lastModifiedTime}, beginTime=#{beginTime}, endTime=#{endTime}, discountAmount=#{discountAmount}, goodsCombination=#{goodsCombination, typeHandler=MyJsonHandler} where dayId=#{dayId} and createTime=#{createTime}
mapper.delete: delete from combinePromotion where dayId=#{dayId} and createTime=#{createTime}
mapper.select: select * from combinePromotion where beginTime <= #{begin} and endTime >= #{end}
